Posts.EditableText: I just checked on my game and i fund the Status Attributes does not shows up in the same order i created them. It is not a terrible problem, however, would be a way to ensure they show up in the game in a a specific order?
Posts.HTML: I just checked on my game and i fund the Status Attributes does not shows up in the same order i created them. It is not a terrible problem, however, would be a way to ensure they show up in the game in a a specific order?

Posts.EditableText: There are two sets, one on the game object, one on the player. I would guess one of those will always be first, but within each group they should be in the order they appear in the GUI of the editor.
Posts.HTML: There are two sets, one on the game object, one on the player. I would guess one of those will always be first, but within each group they should be in the order they appear in the GUI of the editor.

Posts.EditableText: This is not happening. I only used the Status Attributes at the player object, but they were added and are shown in the edition in a different order than shown when the game is running. Weird. But not terribly important, actually.
